body: Sorry if this is a stupid question, but why won't my statistics and pie chart stuff load on my profile? And also when I click 'edit profile' it says the webpage is not available. Am I the only person experiencing this or not?
body_tagged: Sorry if this is a stupid question, but why won't my statistics and pie chart stuff load on my profile? And also when I click 'edit profile' it says the webpage is not available. Am I the only person experiencing this or not?
title: Profile Problems

replies.body: Idk some reason for new members (if u are new) they just wont load.. try logging out of your account on forums.. that usually solves the problem

replies.body: That doesn't work either.. and yeah I joined about a month ago
